ModMetaData.name: Compositable Loadouts
ModMetaData.author: Wiri
ModMetaData.description:
Mix and match multiple 'tags' on a single pawn, allowing for composition of loadouts.
<size=24>Features:</size> - Create tags containing items which a pawn will wear / pick up / equip automatically - Create loadouts consisting of multiple tags for flexibility (composition) - Create bills which make `x` number of items, where `x` is the number of pawns with the tag `y` - Automatically create bills in a given workbench for all created tags - Share tags across multiple saves
<size=24>Mod Integrations:</size> - Better Workbench Management: When copying a bill which targets a tag to another bill, copy the tag with it. - Pick up and Haul: Disable pick up patch from our side when PUAH is loaded (duplicate functionality). - Better Pawn Control: Panic mode integrates with the panic mode in BPC
<size=24>Incompatibilies:</size> - Awesome Inventory: Both mods work in the same space, and will never be compatible. Sorry. - Combat Extended: This mod will be integrated into Combat Extended replacing their existing loadout system in the near (ish) future
<size=24>Credits:</size> - DrowsyCorgi ( NotooShabby ) for their incredible work on Awesome Inventory. I hope that it is visible the influence their mod has had; with regards to both the functionality of the mod, and the aesthetics of the GUI. - Madman666 for their work creating the custom textures which this mod uses - All those who helped test, and gave feedback - it all helps
